title: Venditore
author: Venditore
content: I have a $25 Amazon.com gift card. The card has a duration of 10 years. I'm selling it at a 30% discount.I accept one of these cryptocurrencies of your choice as payment: BTC, ETH, MATIC, USDT.Write me on Telegram: @mvns98

comments.author: whitegold22
comments.body: I need discounted Amazon gc of 400$

comments.author: Venditore
comments.body: Quote from: whitegold22 on April 28, 2023, 07:11:06 PMI need discounted Amazon gc of 400$I only have a single $25 amazon gift card.

comments.author: SimpleThings
comments.body: Don't even bother, kid is scammer. Playing dumb when u request escrow and trying you to make you pay upfront with paypal LMAOnever ever send even 1 cent first to this guy

comments.author: Venditore
comments.body: Quote from: SimpleThings on May 04, 2023, 02:54:52 PMDon't even bother, kid is scammer. Playing dumb when u request escrow and trying you to make you pay upfront with paypal LMAOnever ever send even 1 cent first to this guyThis user refused to pay in USDT first so I didn't sell him anything. I have all the screenshots. After he refused to pay in USDT, I asked him to pay with paypal (so that he can't scam me and I can't scam him, because you can ask for a refund on paypal) and he still refused lol. Don't write me if you want to scam me, I'm not stupid.
